item.title: NASA DEVELOP
item.description: DEVELOP is a capacity building initiative under NASA’s Applied Sciences Program. As a participant, I undertook research projects that focus on the utility of earth observations in alleviating environmental issues. Projects Assessing Coastal Water Quality in Belize’s Coral Reefs This project focused on creating a Google Earth Engine dashboard to extract chlorophyll and turbidity metrics from Sentinel-2 and Landsat 8 optical datasets. Alaska Ecological Forecasting Wetlands are ecosystems that experience seasonal or permanent inundation.
